summary.span: 允许用户从 Windows 窗体应用程序中选择一台打印机，并选择文档中要打印的部分。

span.span: Lets users select a printer and choose which sections of the document to print from a Windows Forms application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建的实例时 ，读/写属性将设置为初始值。When you create an instance of , the read/write properties are set to initial values. 有关这些值的列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of these values, see the constructor. 若要获取用户使用修改的打印机设置 ，请使用 属性。To get printer settings that are modified by the user with the , use the property. 有关 Windows 窗体打印的详细信息，请参阅 命名空间概述。For more information about printing with Windows Forms, see the namespace overview. 如果要从 Windows Presentation Foundation 应用程序进行打印，请参阅 命名空间。If you want to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the namespace. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件设置 、 和 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to set the , , and properties. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含 名为的控件 `PrintDialog1` 和名为的按钮的窗体中 `Button1` 。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a control named `PrintDialog1` and a button named `Button1`. 此示例要求按钮的 事件和 事件已 `docToPrint` 连接到本示例中定义的事件处理方法。This example requires that the button's event and the event of `docToPrint` have been connected to the event-handling methods defined in this example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialogExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialogExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialogExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialogExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialogExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialogExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性对 Windows 2000 和更高版本的 Windows 操作系统有效。This property is valid for Windows 2000 and later versions of Windows operating systems. 在早于 Windows 2000 的操作系统上， 属性不起作用。On operating systems earlier than Windows 2000, the property has no effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性在 Windows 2000 中被标记为已过时，并且不影响 Windows 的此版本和更高版本。This property was marked obsolete in Windows 2000 and does not affect this and later versions of Windows. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件设置 、 和 属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the control setting the , , and properties. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含 名为的控件 `PrintDialog1` 和名为的按钮的窗体中 `Button1` 。To run this example paste the following code in a form that contains a control named `PrintDialog1` and a button named `Button1`. 此示例要求按钮的 事件和的事件已 `docToPrint` 连接到本示例中定义的事件处理方法。This example requires that the button's event and the event of `docToPrint` have been connected to the event handling methods defined in this example. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示对于运行 Windows XP Home Edition、Windows XP Professional、Windows Server 2003 或更高版本的系统，此对话框是否应显示为 Windows XP 样式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog should be shown in the Windows XP style for systems running Windows XP Home Edition, Windows XP Professional, Windows Server 2003 or later.

value.span: 要指示该对话框应当以 Windows XP 样式显示，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to indicate the dialog should be shown with the Windows XP style, otherwise .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为时 `true` ， 将忽略，因为这些属性在 windows 2000 和更高版本的 windows 中已过时。When this property is set to `true`, and will be ignored as these properties were made obsolete for Windows 2000 and later versions of Windows.
